comment.author: 34293388@N06
comment._content: There is probably a misspelling in the name of the place this photo. The name is Odda, not Odde. More information about Odda

comment.author: 34275825@N05
comment._content: Odde is actually the old spelling - it is not a misprint.

comment.author: 34267200@N05
comment._content: The name of the river running from Sandvinvatnet (Sandven Lake) towards Odda is Opo.
